definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system

sentences.english: The fire proves gold, adversity brave men.
The distribution of the gold deposits clings to deep big faults.
sentences.chinese: 金矿床分布与深大断裂存在依附性。

sentences.english: A green variety of chrysoberyl used as a gemstone.
sentences.chinese: 一种绿色的金绿宝石，用作宝石。

sentences.english: Gold recovery from arsenic-containing gold ore has been a major subject of flotation research.
sentences.chinese: 从含砷金矿石中回收金一直是浮选研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: Gold disappeared betweenher legs and the nurses gathered around her head.
sentences.chinese: 金医生坐在她的两腿那边，护士们则站在她的头这边。

sentences.english: Julien: Kim, are there bears at the zoo?
The gold standard failed to outlast the Depression.
sentences.chinese: 金平价未能在经济萧条时期得已持续。

sentences.english: The gold and gold alloy hydride migrate to shallow regions of the crust.
sentences.chinese: 金及金合金氢化物迁移至地壳浅部。

sentences.english: Once the Client loses its Eligibility, the Client will not be entitled to receive any further deposit bonus during the Bonus Offer.
sentences.chinese: 在活动期间，该客户的任何新入金将不会再获得赠金。

sentences.english: Cardiac catheterization with angiography is the reference standard for diagnosing CAD.
sentences.chinese: 心血管导管造影是诊断冠心病的金标准。

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他夺了哈大利谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌带到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: The pictures were given to Associated Press photo editor John Bodkin.
sentences.chinese: 这些照片提供给美联社照片编辑约翰博德金。

sentences.english: Argument against a hydrothermal origin is the sympathetic distribution of uranium and gold.
sentences.chinese: 反对热液成固的理由是铀和金有着一致的分布。

sentences.english: Hydrangea is a spherical gold chrysanthemums hunters.
sentences.chinese: 金绣球是球状菊花的大姐大。

sentences.english: What would you do if you win the lottery?
sentences.chinese: 如果你中了乐透彩金，想用来做什么？

sentences.english: Numerous uniform configurations and merchandise have brought new life to the "Golden Gaels".
sentences.chinese: 众多的统一配置和商品带来了新的生活“金盖尔人”。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing earth/female principle/☷/ancient Chinese compass point: 225° (southwest)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
